events.title: Regen 2023
events.description: The premier UK Smash Ultimate tournament is back, this time for 3 DAYS!

events.title: Tech Republic VII
events.description: Spain's well established Smash Bros. Ultimate Major in Barcelona returns with its 7th edition featuring a capacity of 600+ players.

events.title: Arcamelee #4
events.description: Arcamelee is fruits of a strong partnership between the local Melee community and the Arcaneum gaming bar. Some of the greatest players from around the world like Cody Schwab and moky will be attending this edition. There's a cap op 256 players.

events.title: Vienna Challengers Arena 2023
events.description: Since 2017 Vienna Challengers Arena has been a big part of VIECC¬© Vienna Comic Con and its Super Smash Bros competitions established itself as one of the biggest tournaments in the German-speaking region! This year's edition has a capacity for 512 Smash Bros. Ultimate participants. Partcipation includes access to the entire Vienna Comic Con.

events.title: Ultimate Fighting Arena 2023
events.description: One of the most prestigious fighting game events in the world makes it return with another 3 day event featuring Smash Bros. Ultimate and various other Fighting games.

events.title: Sunrise 2023
events.description: The Cicadas Gaming in collaboration with the city of Hy√®res and all the T.Os of the south-east region of France offer you the very first Smash Bros. Ultimate Major of the region!

events.title: Valhalla IV
events.description: By joining forces with PXB, Scandinavia's most exciting Smash tournament makes a return at the N√∏rrebrohalle with a 4 day event that offers Singles and Doubles competitions for Melee and Ultimate and various FGC side events. There's room for 512 players.

events.title: King Con
events.description: With 3 floors and a capacity for 1024 players King Con is looking to bring all of the biggest names in Europe under one roof for a one-of-a-kind experience that's never been seen before in partnership with Villette eSport Festival. Competitions: 1 vs 1, 2 vs 2 and Squad Strike.

events.title: Grand Conquest 2024
events.description: StreetSmash Manchester(SSM) are highly experienced organisers of Smash Bros. events, having organised events in the North West of England since 2015. They bring you a 2 day Ultimate major with a capacity for 256 players, singles / doubles competitions, a Chaos Bracket and venue pub quiz(18+).

events.title: Somnio V
events.description: Hosted during the Eindhoven Game Festival by established organizers in the Dutch Melee scene Somnio 5 offers singles and doubles competitions for Melee and "Brawl" with a capacity for 224 players.

events.title: Invasion 2024
events.description: Europe's premier Spring major returns for 2 days with competitions for Ultimate and Melee, a total capacity for 512 players, an all Bo5 singles bracket and many social events. Some staff of F√™te is involved with running the Melee portion while Ultimate is ran by Team Regen.

events.title: NRW CUP - Rise of Germany
events.description: NRW CUP scales up significantly with room for 400 attendees for Ultimate and 64 for Melee, offering 100 setups for Ultimate and over 20 setups for Melee all taking place in 1000 m2 of space.

events.title: Smashborg: Siege
events.description: Smashborg: Siege here to further unite the Nordic scene and strengthen its presence in Europe! It's likely to be Norway's biggest Summer tournament this year with competitions for 4 Smash games. There's capacity for 544 players but take note the capacity differs per game.

events.title: Swiss Dome
events.description: Brought to you by the TOs of GamingHotel, Orcus and Smash Contest: DoKomi comes Switzerland's biggest Smash event yet with a capacity for 400 players in a space of 680 m2 housing 70+ available setups. There's competitions for Singles, Doubles and an Amateur bracket.

events.title: Smash Sauna 2024
events.description: Tr3 Gamers, Smash Finland, and Biiruken present to you the third in-person Smash Sauna which aims to be the biggest held in Finland yet! There's singles and doubles events for Melee and Ultimate and a sauna a mere 300 meters from the venue where the after party will be held.

events.title: Icarus 2024
events.description: Situated in the heart of Bologna this Italian Smash Bros. Ultimate major is hosted in the prestigious Royal Carlton Hotel with 800 m2 spread over 2 convention rooms. Aside from regular singles and doubles competitions there's a community area, an arcade room and much more!

events.title: Festa 2024
events.description: A Melee experience unlike anything you've ever seen before üå¥ FESTA is a seven day event with the community in focus, packed with activities, gaming and relaxation. The venue? An island in the Stockholm archipelago. Caught your attention?

events.title: Regen 2024
events.description: The Summertime blockbuster returns and aims to be the biggest Smash Bros. Ultimate event in UK history with a 3 day major hosted in the prestigious Athena Venue in Leicester feat. all Bo5 singles, a capacity of 1024, a line up of global top players in attendance and many social events.

events.title: Ultimate Fighting Arena 2024
events.description: In the tailend of the summer one of the most prestigious fighting game majors in the world returns with singles, squadstrike and doubles competitions for Ultimate alongside many other game competitions.

events.title: Sunrise 2024
events.description: Cicadas Gaming, the city of Hy√®res and the Espace Jeunesse, present to you, the return of Sunrise, bigger than ever with a capacity of for 512+ competitors and singles, doubles, squad strike and ladder competitons as well as several side events!

events.title: SAPF
events.description: The first German Melee major since Awakening 5, back in 2019, features top talent from Europe and beyond with competitions for Singles, Doubles and Crews in 800 m2 of space and over 60 setups for a capacity of 256 competitors.

events.title: GameHotel 2024
events.description: The whole Hotel & Conference Center Sempachersee will morph into "GameHotel" to fill the whole GZI building (around 2000m¬≤) with a FGC tournament feat. a capacity of 192 competitors for Smash Bros. Ultimate. There are singles and doubles competitions.

events.title:
Tartarus: 
 A Netrock Spikedown Major
events.description: Tartarus is a new major tournament series in Vienna in partnership with VCA held at the Vienna Comic Con 2024 and promises a top-tier production. There's a capacity for 512 competitors and regular singles, doubles and ladder competitions.

events.title: No Time To Tilt
events.description: A German Smash Bros. Ultimate major hosted in the SLEEP[BEE]ONE Hotel in M√∂rfelden-Walldorf. There's capacity for 450 competitors and singles, doubles and ladder competitions. Accomodation can be booked at the hotel.

events.title: GSM
events.description: Hosted in the city of Grande-Synthe, Vegacy is bringing a Major for Smash Bros. Ultimate in collaboration with Meta Mind and support of the BDE. There's a singles and grill saga competition and capacity for 512 competitors in a 4500m2 venue offering plenty of setups.

events.title: Let's Start the Fire
events.description: Let's Start The Fire marks a return to the multi-day UK tournament experience you know and love! The event's partnered with Genesis to bring a European qualifier for their supermajor in California this Febuary. Singles, doubles and country crews are the competitions on offer with a capacity for 256 attendees.

events.title: Somnio VI
events.description: From the people behind DreamHack Rotterdam, Sector Z and NL Arcadian, Somnio is back in the Eindhoven Dynamo Centre for its sixth installment with singles and doubles competions for Melee, "Brawl" plus several other games and holds a capacity for 256 attendees.

events.title: Gamescom LAN x CGN Open
events.description: Hosted at the Koelnmesse, known for housing the world-renowned Gamescom, Gamescom LAN joins forces with CGN Esports to establish a major event for the entire fighting game community, uniting players from various titles under one roof. There's singles and doubles competitions for Smash Bros Ultimate and a capacity for at least 350 competitors.

events.title: Valhalla V
events.description: Valhalla is back in the N√∏rrebrohallen for one more rodeo, but this time, the tournament will take place in spring offering an opportunity to experience a warmer and brighter Copenhagen while enjoying some good old Smash in the nation's capital! There are Singles and Doubles competitions for Melee and Ultimate and Rivals of Aether II joins the line up. There's room for 450 attendees total.

events.title: Melee im Kornspeicher 2
events.description: Hosted in the castle of Burg Lohra this is a 4 day event with competitions taking place on friday and saturday accompanied with side events on the other days. Capacity is limited, there's a waiting list to sign up for.

events.title: Uz√®s Symphonic Gaming Festival
events.description: This is the first international festival that combines the world of  eSports and Trading Card Games with the world of symphonic music and aims to offer spectators a unique experience. It features video game tournaments with music played by a symphony orchestra. Smash Bros. Ultimate Singles and Doubles competitions are among the lineup. There's a capacity for 512 competitors.

events.title: The Concert
events.description: As first Swiss Melee Major you're invited to Winterthurs premiere concert venue: The Gaswerk. There's a venue bar, regular singles and doubles competitions, crews and a capacity for 256 attendees. Both days will have afterparties with DJs and local bands on the stage.

events.title: Festa 2025
events.description: Follow up to a Melee experience unlike anything you've ever seen before üå¥ FESTA is a seven day event with the community in focus, packed with activities, gaming and relaxation. The venue? An island in the Stockholm archipelago. Caught your attention?
